mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_session ( user_id, agent_id, title, message_count, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{agentId}, #{title}, #{messageCount}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_session WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_session SET message_count = #{messageCount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_session WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId};
